General.Name: Guangzhou Devotion Therm Tech
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Guangzhou Devotion Thermal Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of clean energy services in China. The company operates through three segments: Comprehensive Clean Energy Services, Industrial Boiler Manufacturing, and Indoor Health and Environment Management. The Comprehensive Clean Energy Services segment offers clean energy products and services, such as heat, cold, and electricity to industrial and commercial users. The Industrial Boiler Manufacturing segment manufactures industrial pressure boilers. The Indoor Health and Environment Management segment develops and manufacture gas wall-hung boilers; and offers heating, fresh air, water purification, and multi-energy integrated systems under Little Squirrel and Laolite brands. It also provides cold, warm, wind, water, smart, and other products, as well as smart and comfortable home system solutions for the home users. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
